page.title: 07School
page.content: {SCHOOL.}Lyndhurst First was built in 1848.{It teaches English, science , {maths, reading, writing, and many {other things. }This is a Church of England Aided School belonging to St. Michaels and All Angels church.{The {school is for children between the {ages of 5 & 8.}There are four classes in the school, Miss Stone cl.1,Mrs. Neale, cl 2, Mrs. Reynolds cl.3 and Mr.Hart cl.4 and the headteacher.{100 {children go to the school from the {villages of Lyndhurst,Emery Down and {Minstead.}The school has a gym,library medical room, office, dinner room and t.v. room kitchen and two play grounds.{The school receives Â£14 per {child from the county for the {educational needs of the school, the {parents raise 100's of pounds from the {wonderful parents of the school.}Rooms have been added in 1969,1959 & 1920's.
